definition: a shade of white the color of bleached bones
details:
noun
- a shade of white the color of bleached bones
= example: a shade of white the color of bleached bones
= synonyms: bone
- a hard smooth ivory colored dentine that makes up most of the tusks of elephants and walruses
= example: a hard smooth ivory colored dentine that makes up most of the tusks of elephants and walruses
= synonyms: tusk
